Title: Wake the Ancients
Description:
There are many ways to keep the gardens safe, and we have allies to help us.

A few Ancients rest dormant in these glades. They are giant trees sworn to defend the forest and the creatures within. 

Use this fragment of my breath to wake them.
ObjectivesText: Use Merithra's Borrowed Breath to wake Ancient Guardians in the Emerald Gardens.
